results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-fc489b4c4-scncj], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-fc489b4c4-scncj' is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Describe pod with `kubectl describe pod wordpress-fc489b4c4-scncj` to find issues. 3. Check logs with `kubectl logs wordpress-fc489b4c4-scncj`. 4. Resolve any errors found.

results.name: default/wordpress-fc489b4c4-scncj

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
